entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Chipewyan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -27.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Chipewyan Airport 12:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -27.0°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -31.1°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
